delta\_axis.label: δ-axis
delta\_axis.description: Deviation / geometric change direction; μ→δ is the μ-weighted deviation.

phi\_axis.label: Φ-axis
phi\_axis.description: Projection / semantic form direction; μ→Φ is the μ-weighted semantic projection.

pi\_axis.label: Π-axis
pi\_axis.description: Evaluation / causal order direction; μ→Π is the μ-weighted evaluation.
